price: ಫರೋಹ ಹೇಳಿದನು: “ಸರಿ! ತಂದು ತೋರಿಸು. ನೀನು ಸತ್ಯವಂತನಾಗಿದ್ದರೆ.”
arabic: قَالَ فَأۡتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Kannada translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kannada language, translated by Muhammad Hamza Battur.

meta.transliteration: qāla fati bihi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
